articles.description: While cinema owners are excited to have a family-friendly title in theaters, industry experts aren't convinced "The Croods" sequel is a box office savior.
articles.content:
"The Croods: A New Age," arriving in movie theaters on Thanksgiving, is a rare bright spot for operators who have been forced to show older films at discounted prices for the last few months.
While … [+3471 chars]
